meanings.definition: Sufficers: those who are enough or adequate
meanings.sent1: In our group project, we had three sufficers who did most of the work.
meanings.sent2: The sufficers in the team ensured that the task was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The sufficers at the party made sure everyone had enough food and drinks.
meanings.sent4: She was like a sufficer in the family, always there to help and support.
meanings.sent5: The sufficers in the community were praised for their hard work and dedication.

meanings.definition: Sufficers: to be sufficient or satisfactory
meanings.sent1: A quick snack sufficers for me before dinner.
meanings.sent2: His explanation sufficers to clarify the concept for most students.
meanings.sent3: Trying to sufficers with just a few hours of sleep left him feeling tired all day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sufficers to brighten up even the gloomiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The simple recipe sufficers to satisfy my craving for something sweet.
